title: Houdini76
author: Houdini76
content: Hi does anyone know of a app which alerts you in real time to large buys made for any particular token ?

comments.author: OmegaStarScream
comments.body: You can check this service: https://cryptocurrencyalerting.com/volume-alert.htmlThe platform only supports the biggest exchanges though, so if you're looking for something to detect the pump-dump on unknown exchanges, this is not going to help.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: There's this nice tool called Nansen.ai where you can track what the huge wallets are buying, and which entities/people are buying/selling/holding certain tokens. Obviously, this doesn't include trades on your typical centralized exchanges such as Binance/etc.^This tool can be quite pricey though, but it's definitely very useful imo if you can afford it, and if you can make smart decisions based on the data.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: Houdini76 on August 12, 2022, 06:46:58 AMHi does anyone know of a app which alerts you in real time to large buys made for any particular token ? If you have twitter you could follow this account.https://twitter.com/whale_alertIt posted some huge movement or transfer of coins usually major coins and top tokens on the market. Pretty sure can help in some determination but not actually traded, bought or sold. You just get hinted on possible action like usdt or busd movement or btc transferring to exchange or wallet.

comments.author: Maus0728
comments.body: There is another service: https://coinalert.me/But then it only supports few of the major exchanges out there. I also suggest that you use throwaway telegram or email instead of downloading it directly from playstore for receiving the alerts just to preserve some privacy though.
